CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: bioferrite penetrator
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Depleted uranium core wrapped in a bioferrite jacket. Ignited bioferrite seeks its target with a hungry malevolence, propelling the core forward like a HEAT round.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: consecrated silver
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shard-infused silver bullet, blessed with an unstable psychic resonance. Blooms into a localized entropy spike on impact, effectively degrading all manner of organized structures.
